protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

After seed sterilisation, seeds were kept in water for 3 days in the dark at 4 degrees. Seeds were sterilised by surface treatment with 25% bleach (Danklorix, Germany) and 0.02% Triton X-100 for 6 minutes followed by three washes with de-ionized water. Growth chamber Agar minimal plant nutrient agar plates (Haughn and Somerville, 1986.Mol Gen Genet 204:430-434). Plants were grown for 14 days to stage 1.04 (4 rosette leaves > 1mm).
Seedlings harvested and snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen and RNA extracted as described in the Qiagen RNAeasy kit.
Labelled using protocol described in manual "Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual", One-Cycle target labelling
Biotin Labelled cRNA using "Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit", according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA
Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.
Raw data from the microarrays was normalized at probe-level using MAS5 algorithm. The detection calls (present, marginal, absent) for each probe set was obtained using the GCOS system
